dcterms:creator: Oscar Koller
Jens Forster
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather multi-signer dataset focuses on the German sign language and is one of the most popular benchmark datasets in continuous sign language recognition. It contains 6,841 sentences performed by 9 different signers, recorded from a public television broadcast.
dcterms:title: RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather multi-signer

dcterms:creator: Oscar Koller
Sepehr Zargaran
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather signer-independent dataset is a variant of the RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather dataset that focuses on signer-independent recognition. It includes a training set with 8 signers and a test set with 1 signer who was not included in the training.
dcterms:title: RWTH-PHOENIX-Weather signer-independent

dcterms:creator: Jie Huang
Wengang Zhou
Qilin Zhang
Houqiang Li
Weiping Li
dcterms:description: The CSL dataset is a continuous Chinese sign language dataset containing 5,000 videos performed by 50 signers. It includes a total of 100 different sentences with a vocabulary size of 100 sign words.
dcterms:title: CSL
